text: Mary Loretta Landrieu ( ;AP News Pronunciation Guide born November 23, 1955) is an American politician. She served as a U.S. Senator of Louisiana from 1997 to 2015. Landrieu is a member of the United States Democratic Party. She was raised in New Orleans. Her brother Mitch Landrieu was the Mayor of New Orleans. Her father Moon Landrieu also served as Mayor of New Orleans. She is considered a conservative Democrat, often opposed to the views of many others within her party. She lost re-election in 2014 to Republican U.S. Representative Bill Cassidy. ==Sources== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American Roman Catholics Category:People from Arlington County, Virginia Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Members of the Louisiana State Legislature Category:United States senators from Louisiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:20th-century American politicians
title: Mary Landrieu
